mapper.select:
select o.oid, order_no as orderNo, provider_oid as providerOid, warehouse_oid as warehouseOid, order_date as orderDate, state, description, o.create_user_id, o.create_time, u.uid, u.user_name, p.name as providerName, p.linkman as providerLinkman, p.linkman_telphone as providerTelphone, p.fax as providerFax from t_order o left join t_sys_user u on o.create_user_id=u.uid left join t_provider p on o.provider_oid=p.oid where 1=1
and o.oid = #{oid}

select order_oid, product_oid as productOid, num from t_order_dt where 1=1
and order_oid=#{orderOid}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order(order_no, warehouse_oid, provider_oid, order_date, state, description, create_user_id, create_time) values(#{orderNo}, #{warehouseOid}, #{providerOid}, #{orderDate}, #{state}, #{description}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime})

insert into t_order_dt(order_oid, product_oid, num) values
(#{item.orderOid},#{item.productOid},#{item.num})
mapper.update: update t_order set state=#{state} where oid=#{oid}
